SELECT user_id AS userId, news_id AS contentId, LEAST(5, ( -- 基础互动评分（浏览、点赞、收藏） (total_views * 0.25 + total_upvotes * 0.35 + total_collects * 0.4) * 0.7 +
-- 时长奖励分 CASE WHEN total_duration < 6000 THEN 0 WHEN total_duration < 20000 THEN 0.5 WHEN total_duration < 60000 THEN 1.2 ELSE 1.8 END ) * -- 活跃度调节因子 (1 + LOG(1 + (total_views + total_upvotes + total_collects) / 10)) ) AS score FROM (SELECT user_id, news_id, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_views, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_upvotes, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_collects, SUM(CASE WHEN type = 4 THEN times ELSE 0 END) AS total_duration FROM action_operation WHERE type IN (1, 2, 3, 4) -- 点赞(1)、浏览(2)、收藏(3)、停留(4) GROUP BY user_id, news_id HAVING total_views > 0 OR total_upvotes > 0 OR total_collects > 0) AS aggregated_data ORDER BY score DESC
